faq.title: Frequently
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our platform

items.a: Our system allows you to create, manage and organize users with different roles and permissions easily and efficiently.
We support over 50 popular integrations including third-party APIs, authentication services, and analytics tools.
Our platform offers optimized performance with response times under 100ms on Basic plans and under 50ms on higher plans.
Yes, our RBAC (Role-Based Access Control) system allows you to configure granular permissions for team members.
Yes, all plans include a 14-day free trial with no credit card required. You can cancel anytime.
We offer email support on Basic, priority support on Professional, and dedicated 24/7 support on Enterprise plans.
